column1: #`THIS IS THE RESULT OF DATAMINING AND HASN'T BEEN TESTED IN DEPTH`

column4: Rumor 1 - There's an Observatory on Dark Bramble's north pole with two security measures keeping the door shut.
Rumor 2 - Datura discovered something that disturbed him, but he had to go his Observatory to confirm it.
Fact 1 - I found Datura's body...
Fact 3 - At his projection pool, Datura attempted to warn the others of the Interloper, but they already knew about it.
Fact 4 - Datura was able to get Solanum to be at the Quantum Moon's sixth location as the Interloper arrived.
Fact 1 - A Nomai named Datura discovered a spherical region in space where the stars flickered occasionally.
Fact 2 - Upon meeting a being from another species, Datura helped build them a house at the South Pole.
Fact 3 - Datura discovered something that disturbed him, but he had to go his Observatory to confirm it.
Rumor 1 - The stairs to the top of the Study Tower have collapsed.
Rumor 2 - I can see a wall with Nomai text through the window.
Fact 1 - Datura added a second security measure to his Observatory. The door will remain shut if another space ship is on Dark Bramble's surface.
Rumor 1 - Upon meeting a being from another species, Datura helped build them a house at the South Pole.
Rumor 2 - Datura built a shelter for himself at the south pole.
Fact 1 - Datura teached Friend the Nomai language, and they teached him art.
Fact 2 - Datura argued at Yarrow that they should be finding a way to leave this star system. Datura, promising Filix he would return, left to Dark Bramble to find the Vessel.
Fact 3A - Datura is pessimistic about the Eye, and believes it will destroy the universe if someone interacts with it.
Fact 3B - Friend is optimistic about the Eye, and believes it is the creator of universes.
Fact 4 - In Friend's House, I found a staircase that leads down abruptly to a painting of a terrestrial world, with a blue ringed gas giant in the sky.
Rumor 1 - In Friend's House, I found a staircase that leads down abruptly to a painting of a terrestrial world, with a blue ringed gas giant in the sky.
Fact 1 - A secret room in Friend's House contains an image revealing a hidden path behind a jellyfish surrounded by ice.
Fact 2 - Datura and Friend discussed their theories about the Eye, and suggested that they may both be partially true.
Rumor 1 - A secret room in Friend's House contains an image revealing a hidden path behind a jellyfish surrounded by ice.
Fact 1 - The entrance to this building appears to have been sealed. Datura theorised that only an explosion could create an opening.
Fact 2 - If I want to return here, I should use the Mark Location on HUD feature, like Slate told me about.
Rumor 1 - The entrance to this building appears to have been sealed. Datura theorised that only an explosion could create an opening.
Fact 1 - I found the remains of Friend... holding an artifact next to a green fire.
Fact 2 - Datura was curious what Friend was hiding from him and sneaked here. He found an artifact and green fire, tripped and knocked himself out, awaking on what appeared to be a different planet.
Fact 3 - Datura came across Friend's elders, and accidentally rang an alarm bell which woke one up.
Fact 4 - He was awoken by Friend, with some others having arrived on Dark Bramble.
Fact 5 - They separated them from each other, containing Friend by sealing the entrance.
Rumor 1 - Datura landed on Dark Bramble in a shuttle, which he didn't know what to do with.
Fact 1 - A Nomai called Datura created this to destroy his shuttle. After damaging the shuttle, its alarm went off, and exploded a while after.

Fact 2 - Someone referred to as 'Friend' also wanted to destroy their ship. After damaging their ship, its alarm went off too. Datura remembered that he should just stand back and wait until it exploded.
Fact 3 - I used a switch to activate the crusher.
Fact 4 - In a recording, Datura told his daughter Solanum about the Vessel crash.
Rumor 1 - A structure next to the Study Tower appears to have broken off and fallen into the planet somewhere.
Rumor 2 - Datura built a projection pool on an island west of his landing site to be able to talk to his wife and daughter.
Fact 1 - Datura tried to leave Dark Bramble, but both shuttles were in use at that time.
Fact 2 - Datura asked Bells to tell Solanum there was no need to rush, and to tell Filix that he was sorry and would see her again soon.
Fact 3 - In a damaged stone, Datura called the others to warn them about something. But, they already knew about it.
Fact 3 (ATP) - In the undamaged stone, Datura tried to warn the others about the Interloper. But, they already knew about it.
Fact 4 - Datura and Solanum planned to meet after he had finished something, and after she had returned from the Quantum Moon.
Rumor 1 - Datura, needing a food supply, considered eating... the Anglerfish.
Fact 1 - Datura went exploring the depths of Dark Bramble. Partly to find... food.
Fact 2A - Datura also discovered that Anglerfish are blind.
Fact 2B - On telling the discovery to Yarrow, he was interested at first, but the conversation turned into a big argument.
Fact 3 - Datura found the remains of the Nomai of Escape Pod 3, and his clan's leader, Escall.
Rumor 1 - Datura mentioned something called 'The Collector,' but didn't elaborate.
Fact 1 - A mysterious planet that spewed out a deadly substance that was contained in water worlds and comets.
Rumor 1 - A campsite next to the Shuttle Crusher that I didn't explore.
Fact 1 - Where a Nomai named 'Datura' first landed on Dark Bramble and set up camp.
Feldspar left a recording here saying they explored around and had 'some ideas' on how to get into places, and offers his help if I want it.
Rumor 1 - I fired a scout through a bramble seed and it exited out of another somewhere.
Fact 1 - A power station that uses Bramble Seeds to connect all locations on Dark Bramble to a power source.
Fact 2 - According to a Nomai computer, the 'Gravity Stability System' has been disabled by a recent Coronal Mass Ejection from the sun that hit Dark Bramble.
Fact 3 - I used a switch to turn off power to one of the locations.
Fact 4 - I fired a scout through a bramble seed and it exited out of another on Dark Bramble.
Rumor 1 - The Eye. Is it a creator or a destroyer of universes? ...Do I want to find out?
Fact 1 - If you are reading this, I assume you have gotten inside the Northern Observatory and have seen the new ending at the Eye. Thank you so much for playing The Outsider! I hope you enjoyed it!
Rumor 1 - I found... the remains of Friend, holding an artifact next to a green fire.
Fact 1 - I met Friend! They had to communicate using the Nomai language, as I can't translate theirs.
Fact 2 - For one of the security measures, Datura used a quantum shard to effect the Northern Observatory's door, so I must not be looking at the door when entering.
Fact 3 - The Prisoner released the Eye's signal briefly and was contained in the simulation. He was planned to be released into just the simulation with the others.
Fact 4 - By the time the Nomai arrived, Friend's elders had 'decayed' into the simulation. Only a small group of the youngest were still alive outside.
